Articles.Content:
I just looked through the scenarios the first time after 500h+ playtime and i must say, it is quite interesting.

Now I wonder; Are there any "packs" to download? Did have a look fore them but couldn't find them myself.
There are none that I know of, however the saves are not hard coded into the game so I suppose you could mover a save in there.

I remember there being scenario packs, but now we have actual contracts and they are obsolete. I think I played a mission or two made by some forum user, but that was before career mode with it's contract system.

> 
> I remember there being scenario packs, but now we have actual contracts and they are obsolete. I think I played a mission or two made by some forum user, but that was before career mode with it's contract system.

Thats what i remember too. Sad i hoped there would be a missions pack. Thnaks anyways
